meanings.definition: A garment worn under outer clothing, covering the lower part of the body from the waist to the thighs.
meanings.sent1: I put on my underpants before wearing my pants.
meanings.sent2: She bought new underpants at the store.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's underpants were on the outside of his costume.
meanings.sent4: Her underpants were a shield against the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: The colorful underpants peeked out from his jeans.

meanings.sent1: Mom bought me a new pair of underpants.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the underpants, thinking they were a toy.
meanings.sent4: His lucky underpants helped him win the game.
meanings.sent5: The underpants had a funny pattern on them.
